Title: The Rebel
Writer: Charlie Nguyen, Johnny Nguyen, Dominic Pereira
Actors: Johnny Nguyen, Veronica Ngo, Dustin Nguyen, Thang Nguyen
Plot: In French ruled Vietnam in 1922, the French and Vietnamese officers plot to sniff out arch-rebel De Canh. But, Officer Cuong is disabused. He and De Canh's daughter, rebel Vo Thanh Thuy, ...
